Service Details: - Provides financial assistance to help low-income seniors and people with disabilities in BC to continue to live in the comfort of their home - If you or a member of your family are having difficulty performing day-to-day activities independently and safely, the HAFI program may be able to help - Home owners or renters may be eligible for assistance if they meet the eligibility requirements
Eligibility: Please visit the website or contact for full eligibility and application requirements
